title: The Quest for the Unbreakable Password

nodes.speaker: Dr. Strong
nodes.text: Welcome, adventurer! The Cyber Kingdom is threatened by the Hacker Lord! Do you know how to forge a strong password to defend yourself?

nodes.speaker: Hacker Lord
nodes.text: Hehehe… You think you are ready? Then tell me… Is 'Password123' strong?

nodes.speaker: Hacker Lord
nodes.text: 'Password123'? I cracked it before breakfast! Your shield shatters—better learn from Dr. Strong!

nodes.speaker: Dr. Strong
nodes.text: You are right! Weak passwords are easily cracked. But knowledge alone is not enough—let’s forge a truly strong one.

nodes.speaker: Dr. Strong
nodes.text: A strong password is your magical shield. It should be long—at least 12 characters—and include letters, numbers, and symbols.

nodes.speaker: Dr. Strong
nodes.text: To create a strong password, you must gather four mystical ingredients: Length, Complexity, Uniqueness, and Secrecy!

nodes.speaker: Dr. Strong
nodes.text: Length makes your shield harder to break. Complexity mixes upper, lower, numbers, and symbols. Uniqueness prevents the same shield from opening every door. And secrecy means never sharing your password… not even with your cat.

nodes.speaker: Dr. Strong
nodes.text: Which method will you use to forge your password?

options.text: Let a password manager create one!

nodes.speaker: Hacker Lord
nodes.text: Muahaha! I cracked it instantly. You need more power!

nodes.speaker: Hacker Lord
nodes.text: No… impossible! This password… I cannot break it! But I’ll return!

nodes.speaker: Dr. Strong
nodes.text: Password managers are reliable spellbooks that store all your passwords safely and even conjure strong ones. Excellent choice!

nodes.speaker: Dr. Strong
nodes.text: You have forged the Unbreakable Password! The Hacker Lord retreats. Remember: long, complex, unique—and keep it secret!

nodes.speaker: Dr. Strong
nodes.text: Story <The Quest for the Unbreakable Password> complete! More Cyber adventures await...

nodes.speaker: System
nodes.text: (a new article <Strong Password Learn Guide> is available in your Traveler's journal)
